title: Linux dirname Command with Practical Examples
description: Learn how to use the dirname command in Linux to retrieve the directory name from a file path. Explore practical examples and combine dirname with other Linux commands.

meta.title: Linux dirname Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Learn how to use the dirname command in Linux to retrieve the directory name from a file path. Explore practical examples and combine dirname with other Linux commands.
meta.keywords: linux, dirname, file path, directory, command line, file operations
